title: Construction of new hospital wing
description: Tender for construction and development of a modern hospital wing with state-of-the-art medical facilities, including operating rooms, patient wards, and diagnostic equipment areas.

title: IT Infrastructure Upgrade
description: Supply and installation of network infrastructure, servers, and cloud computing solutions for government offices. Includes data center equipment and networking hardware.

title: Road Maintenance Services
description: Annual road maintenance contract covering asphalt repair, pothole filling, line marking, and winter maintenance services for municipal roads.

title: Medical Equipment Supply
description: Procurement of diagnostic medical equipment including MRI machines, CT scanners, ultrasound devices, and laboratory testing equipment for regional hospitals.

title: Office Furniture and Equipment
description: Supply of ergonomic office furniture, desks, chairs, filing cabinets, and office equipment for new government building complex.

title: Software Development Services
description: Custom software development for citizen services portal, including web application development, mobile app creation, and API integration services.

title: Building Renovation Project
description: Complete renovation of historic municipal building including structural repairs, electrical system upgrades, plumbing improvements, and interior refurbishment.

title: Cleaning Services Contract
description: Daily cleaning and maintenance services for government office buildings, including floor care, waste management, and sanitation services.

title: Vehicle Fleet Procurement
description: Purchase of electric and hybrid vehicles for municipal fleet including passenger cars, vans, and light commercial vehicles with charging infrastructure.

title: Consulting Services for Digital Transformation
description: Strategic consulting services for digital transformation initiatives, business process optimization, and change management for public sector organizations.
